name: KASUTORU
description:
Being a skeleton living in an abandoned castle, every Halloween is a night for a huge party!

The problem is... this time you got so wasted, you woke up the next day to find out your body, along with your skeletons friends' bodies, went missing.

Jump your way through the castle's challenges to get your body back and try not to lose your head, it's the only thing you have left!

- ! The browser version may have slight differences due to some fixes I had to make in order for it to work. If the game is lagging or something just doesn't feel right, please let me know and consider playing the windows version. ! -
